translations: 与……订婚（affiance 的过去式和过去分词）

sentences.sentence: He saw and won the love of a high minded and beautiful woman, in one of the northern states, and they were affianced.
sentences.translation: 他在北方某州结识了一位高贵而美丽的小姐，赢得了她的芳心，不久，两人便以终身相许。

sentences.sentence: I landed here, regulated the affairs of the vessel, and hastened to visit my affianced bride, whom I found more lovely than ever.
sentences.translation: 我在此地靠岸，安排了船上的事，就赶快去看我的未婚妻了，我发现她更可爱，比以前更爱我了。
